description:
The Tony Blair Institute (TBI) has examined AI’s impact on the workforce. The report outlines AI’s potential to reshape work environments, boost productivity, and create opportunities—while warning of potential challenges ahead. “Technology has a long history of profoundly reshaping the world of work,” the report begins. From the agricultural revolution to the digital age, each... Read more »

The post Understanding AI’s impact on the workforce appeared first on AI News.
title: Understanding AI’s impact on the workforce

description:
The intelligence displayed by generative AI chatbots like OpenAI’s ChatGPT has captured the imagination of individuals and corporations, and artificial intelligence has suddenly become the most exciting area of technology innovation. AI has been recognised as a game changer, with potential to transform many aspects of our lives. From personalised medicine to autonomous vehicles, automated... Read more »

The post Centralised AI is dangerous: how can we stop it? appeared first on AI News.
title: Centralised AI is dangerous: how can we stop it?
